name: Desert Eagle (.50AE autoloader)
description: A powerful semi-automatic handgun known for its .50AE chambering.

name: Knife
description: A general-purpose knife, suitable for combat or utility.

name: Club
description: A simple bludgeoning weapon, such as a heavy stick or cudgel.

name: Makeshift Shiv
description: A crudely sharpened piece of metal. Better than nothing.

name: Torch
description: A wooden torch. Provides light and can ignite flammable objects.

name: Flamethrower
description: A military-grade flamethrower. Unleashes a cone of fire.

name: Pepper Spray
description: A canister of chemical irritant. Sprays a cone of gas that blinds and irritates.

name: Digestive Clamp
description: A horrifying biological clamp that secretes digestive enzymes.

name: Digestive Clamp/Taser Shock
description: A mutated clamp capable of delivering electric shocks.

description: The largest caliber sporting rifle ever made.

description: A British anti-tank rifle firing .55 Boys cartridges.

description: A heavy stopping rifle designed for dangerous game.

description: A gigantic shotgun used for commercial waterfowl hunting.

description: An AR-platform rifle chambered in .500 Auto Max.

description: A massive revolver chambered in .454 Casull.

description: BFR chambered in the government cartridge.

description: A vicious bite from a canine.
